subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In a predictably ragged first game, the Knicks held off the Nets and got a pleasant surprise in the play of rookie guard Iman Shumpert, who had 16 points in 25 minutes off the bench.
snippet: In a predictably ragged first game, the Knicks held off the Nets and got a pleasant surprise in the play of rookie guard Iman Shumpert, who had 16 points in 25 minutes off the bench.
